EmailTemplate.name: Mentorship Request Waitlisted Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Mentorship Application Waitlisted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Copado Certification Maintenance Reminder
Mentorship Request Waitlisted Hello and thank you for your interest in the Copado Mentorship Program. Due to overwhelming response to the program, our next cohort is full and so you have been waitlisted as a mentee to a future cohort. We want to make sure you are as successful as possible, and need a little extra time to match you up with a mentor to help you meet your DevOps goals. We will communicate again with you in the future, for admittance into a future cohort.
In the meantime, we will be offering other workshops, trainings, and of course there are many modules in the Academy for you to complete so your goals are not delayed. Please check our Training Calendar because we have so many fun events going on. We are so excited to work with you SOON. If you have any questions, please contact the Mentorship team at mentorship@copado.com
-The Copado Mentorship Team. Â© Copyright {!YEAR(TODAY())} Copado Solutions S.L. All rights reserved. This e-mail was sent automatically by Copado Solutions, S.L. We process your email address, as well as the rest of the information and personal data that you provide, in order to carry out the management and archiving of the communications and their attachments for security reasons, the inclusion of the data in our contact list, and the sending of electronic professional communications. You have the right to obtain confirmation about whether Copado Solutions, S.L., is processing your personal data, so, in consequence, you have the right to access your personal data, correct inaccurate data, or request its deletion when the data is no longer necessary. You also have the right to oppose the processing of your data, request limitation to the processing, and request the portability of your data. If you consider that your personal data has not been processed in accordance with the regulations, you can contact privacy@copado.com. You can also submit a claim to the Spanish Data Protection Agency, especially when you have not obtained satisfaction in the exercise of your rights, through the electronic website at www.aepd.es. For additional information about ways Copado may process your data check our Privacy section at https://copado.com/privacy-policy/
